channel.title: Unlocking the Power of Data Visualization with R

image.title: Unlocking the Power of Data Visualization with R

item.title: 30DayMapChallenge 2021
item.description:
Metamapping Day
This is the collage of all maps made for 2021.
Nov 30, 2021

Null
This map is a .tif image of the Earth downloaded from Earth-SAT.
Nov 29, 2021

The Earth is not flat
Globe map, data is from rnaturalearth.
Nov 28, 2021

Heatmap
John Snow’s 1854 Cholera Deaths London’s Map. Data: Blog.RtWilson.com.
Nov 27, 2021

Choropleth Map
Map of the World Population density per sq mile and Number of vulnerable people in the area. WorldBank Datacatalog.
Nov 26, 2021

Interactive Map
Leaflet Map of My birthplace: Rome.
Nov 25, 2021

Historical Map
Map of 18th Century Shipping Expeditions 1781 - 1799. Data is from Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750-1850.
Nov 24, 2021

Data Challenge 3: GHSL
Global Human Settlement Layer (GHSL) - Italy 1km resolution, population in 2015.
Nov 23, 2021

Boundaries
This World map shows the world boundaries, data is from {rgeoboundaries}.
Nov 22, 2021

Elevation
Alaska! map shows the Surface Elevation Change (SEC), data is from CPOM CryoSat.
Nov 21, 2021

Movement
This map of Italy shows the Alitalia Flights, data is from openflights.
Nov 20, 2021

Island(s)
This a map of Japan with cities from mapdata::get('world.cities').
Nov 19, 2021

Water
John Snow data for this map with read_stars(). Data is from the blog.rtwilson.com.
Nov 18, 2021

Land
This New York's population map is made with Studio Unfolded AI and styled with R.
Nov 17, 2021

Urban / Rural
This is The Netherlands: Hurban and Rural and Schools near by..., data is from cbs.nl opendata.
Nov 16, 2021

Map made without using a Computer
This is America hand made map.
Nov 15, 2021

Map with a New Tool
This map is made with Studio Unfolded AI and then styled with R.
Nov 14, 2021

Map Challenge 2: Natural Earth
This map represent the NATURAL EARTH GDP ESTIMATION, data is from the rnaturalearth package - View: EPSG:5368.
Nov 13, 2021

Population
This is a representation of the World Population 1950 vs 2030.
Nov 12, 2021

3d
The data for this World 3D map is a Sat-view (8am 11.11.2021-GMT+11), data is from bom.gov.au and the {bomrang} package.
Nov 11, 2021

Raster
This is a map of Africa Population transition 2000-2020, data is from TidyTuesday 2021 week 46 afrilearndata.
Nov 10, 2021

Monochrome
This art work represent Italy, data is from the spData package.
Nov 9, 2021

Blue

This map Globe Observer shows Sat View of Australia, data is from the Australian Bureau of Meterorology and the {ozmaps} for the geometry of Australia.

Nov 8, 2021

Green
This map of Greater London with cycle hire and borough boundaries is created using data from TidyTuesday 2021 week 45 - spData.
Nov 7, 2021

Red
This US Drought map shows available values by County - Jan to July 2021, data is from TidyTuesday 2021 week 30.
Nov 6, 2021

Data Challenge 1: OpenStreetMap
This map of Berlin water is made with data from osmdata package.
Nov 5, 2021

Hexagons
This map of Boston is made with data from spData package.
Nov 4, 2021

Polygons
The Isole Åland belonged to the provinces that the Swedish Empire had to cede to the Russian Empire with the Treaty of Fredrikshamn in September 1809, and became part of the…
Nov 3, 2021

Lines
This map of France is created with data from the maps R-package.
Nov 2, 2021

Points
This map is made with data from TidyTuesday 2021 week44 Race.
Nov 1, 2021
No matching items

item.title: 30DayMapChallenge 2022
item.description:
Remix
Improving map Islands (day 26) with Campsites in Urupukapuka Island no dogs allowed. Data is from the New Zealand Hydrographic Authority & data.govt.nz.
Nov 30, 2022

Out of my comfort zone
Foursquare Map Month Competition Winner: United States Permanent amount of precipitations on Global Railways.
Nov 29, 2022

3d
Map of Oregon Population Density. Data is from Kontur population US and the {tigris} package.
Nov 28, 2022

Music
US Map of Artists by states distribution. Data is from TidyTuesday 2022 week 39 US Artists.
Nov 27, 2022

Islands
A static leaflet map of Islands, data is from the New Zealand Hydrographic Authority.
Nov 26, 2022

Colour Friday: 2 Colors
This map of Alaska housing is made with FourSquare Studio.
Nov 25, 2022

Fantasy
Astonishing World Map projection: projection_bonne. Data is from the rnaturalearth package.
Nov 24, 2022

Movement
Map of the Movements to Europe through the Mediterranean and Western Balkans migration routes, 2017 flows: Italy overview. DataSource: @humdata.
Nov 23, 2022

Null
This is the Happy Planet Index - World Map, data is from the tmap package.
Nov 22, 2022

Data: Kontur Population Dataset
This is a map of Costa Rica Population density, data is from Kontur Population dataset - @KonturInc.
Nov 21, 2022

My favourite
This is my favorite Dubois data portraits. Data is from TidyTuesday 2022 week 6, Tuskegee Airmen: Aerial Victories Air Force Historical Research Agency Graduation 1942 - 1948.
Nov 20, 2022

Globe
rnaturalearth for making this Globe Map.
Nov 19, 2022

Colour Friday: Blue
This a map of Milan, Italy with religious locations. Data is from the osmdata package.
Nov 18, 2022

A Map Without Computer
This is a self standing Ocean World Globe.
Nov 17, 2022

Minimal
Hexagon map of Boston housing, data is from spData::boston.c. It shows the median values of owner-occupied housing in USD 1000.
Nov 16, 2022

Food / Drink
Map of European Countries Foodborne Campylobacter Outbreaks, data is from www.efsa.europa.eu
Nov 15, 2022

Hexagons
Hexagons to style a US map of Covid19 cases, data is from the CDC and the tidycensus package.
Nov 14, 2022

5 Minute Map
A World map made with data from the ggplot2 package.
Nov 13, 2022

Scale
This is a static leaflet map of the Atlantic Ocean Storms in 2005.
Nov 12, 2022

Colour Friday: Red
This red map is a map of the US FM Boosters - FB Radio Stations. Data is from TidyTuesday 2022 week 45 Radio Stations by the FM Service Contour Data Points (fcc.gov).
Nov 11, 2022

A Bad Map
This map is a drawback of a .tif image of North America and Alaska from the OSM.
Nov 10, 2022

Space
This Global map is created with a tool called fourmilab.ch/yoursky and represent some particular constellations that can be spotted from that point of view.
Nov 9, 2022

Data: OpenStreetMap
Map of Rome, Italy city center with military locations.
Nov 8, 2022

Raster
Map of Oregon Spotted Frogs: Rana Pretiosa frequent locations.
Nov 7, 2022

Network
New York City subways, map headways by route & Population density. Subway routes id are from 1 to 7 with extension coded X,A,D,E,F,G,J,L,M,N,Q and R. Data for NY Subways is…
Nov 6, 2022

Ukraine
Map of Ukraine, data from Geodata.
Nov 5, 2022

Colour Friday: Green
This is a map of Historic district of Rome.
Nov 4, 2022

Polygons
Map of Private health insurance status in New York. Census tracts data is from census.gov.
Nov 3, 2022

Lines
This is a map of Long-term rivers average discharge in Italy and surrounding areas. Values m3/s for rivers with length in km greater than 1.780. Data is from hydrosheds.org.
Nov 2, 2022

Points
Malaria prevalence in children, data recorded at villages in The Gambia, Africa. Data is from {geoR} package.
Nov 1, 2022
No matching items

item.title: 30DayMapChallenge 2023
item.description:
My Favourite
This last map of the #30DayMapChallenge month is my favourite view of the life expectancy. Source of data are Statistics Netherlands (CBS) and Kadaster Nederland via the tmap…
Nov 30, 2023

Population
This Ireland Map explore the population density in the area. Data is from the latest version of Kontur Population available at United Nations Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX).
Nov 29, 2023

Is This A Chart Or A Map
This is a bubble chart on a Map. Data is from tmap::data("World").
Nov 28, 2023

Dot
This Dot Map comprises an overview of the EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset (also EPSG registry). A public registry of geodetic datums, spatial reference systems, Earth…
Nov 27, 2023

Minimal
This is a minimal Climate Raster Map for worldclim data and species distribution.
Nov 26, 2023

Antarctica
This is a Map of Antarctica made with the rOpenSci {antanym} package provided by
Nov 25, 2023

Black&White
This Black & white Belgium Map is build creating a grid of points.
Nov 24, 2023

3d
This is the 3D Italy’s Population Density Map made with the instruction provided by Milos Agathon: Milos Makes Maps tutorial:
Nov 23, 2023

North Is Not Always Up
This Map represent four countries with diverse GDP. One in the south side of the earth, Australia has a higher GDP value compared to northern side countries. Data is from the …
Nov 22, 2023

Raster
How to color a Raster Map with R.
Nov 21, 2023

Outdoors
World map of the Coastlines Scalerank. Data is from rnaturalearthhires package.
Nov 20, 2023

5 Minute Map
A 5-minute map made with {tmap} package to visualize the Estimate Population change 1950-2030.
Nov 19, 2023

Atmosphere
This challenge is all about wind movements. The selected area is Italy, also some parts of the surrounding territories can be seen. I am going to use the {rWind} package for…
Nov 18, 2023

Flow
This map of the HydroRIVERS for the Iberia peninsula and surrounding areas is made coloring by the DIST_UP_KM.
Nov 17, 2023

Oceania
This map of Oceania shows Population Peaks of Oceania’s Cities.
Nov 16, 2023

OpenStreetMap
OpenStreetMap data map for Valencia schools and underground stations.
Nov 15, 2023

Europe
Eurostat data with R. I used the eurostat package to shows European Child and Youth Population.
Nov 14, 2023

Choropleth
This map shows the Epidemic transition of new HIV infections, metrics trend from 2010 to 2020. Percentage contribution of each country’s change to the total change. Data is…
Nov 13, 2023

South America
For this challenge I look back at day 8 Africa and the total fertility rate for replicating the steps for South America.
Nov 12, 2023

Retro
A place that has undergone significant changes over time is the city of Berlin, Germany. Berlin has a rich and complex history, and its geography and political boundaries…
Nov 11, 2023

North America
This is a map of the Canada country’s regions. Data is from rnaturalearth}.
Nov 10, 2023

Hexagons
Hexagons map of Covid19 data in Italy. For this challenge I will be using the covid19italy package for mapping Covid19 cases in Italy.
Nov 9, 2023

Africa
For this challenge I looked at an interesting resource: Analyzing US Census Data: Methods, Maps, and Models in R, also found the {idbr} package R Interface to the US Census…
Nov 8, 2023

Navigation
This Leaflet map represents 3D flights of European free-tailed bat spotted from 2017-08-08 to 2017-08-15. There are 8 individual.local.identifier for bats taxonomy Tadarida…
Nov 7, 2023

Asia
For this #30DayMapChallenge 2023 Day6 - Asia let’s explore the Population estimation for Regions and major Cities, from different sources.
Nov 6, 2023

Analog Map
🗺️ Analog maps, aka paper maps, are real-deal geographic representations on tangible surfaces. Here is a postage stamp map of Portofino, Italy emitted by Poste Italiane in…
Nov 5, 2023

A Bad Map
A Bad Map Exaggerated 3D View of the United States
Nov 4, 2023

Polygons
This is a map of Colombia Malaria incidence in 1998 - Data is from Geodatacenter.
Nov 3, 2023

Lines
This NewYork map data is from the USDA NRCS Geospatial Data Gateway. Made with {topo.ridges} package.
Nov 2, 2023

Points
A points map of the Bovine Tubercoulosis Farm Locations in Cornwall, UK (South West England). Data is from the spatstat package.
Nov 1, 2023
